All, in my slow and never ending study on the Suishinshi Masahide mon, I 
came across ( whilst searching for Nobuiye documents ) a tsuba made by 
Suishinshi Masahide. This is like a double whammy for me LOL.

This is the first time I have seen documentation of Masahide making 
tsuba and it is very interesting for me. I am now on a search for more 
info to see if he made more than this one.

I have this page supplied below and would really appreciate an accurate 
( or as accurate as possible ) translation if someone has the time. I 
can get all the standard Tsuba/Nihotno related Kanji but it is stringing 
it all together that stumps me.

And if anyone ever sees anything like this for sale, please please let 
me know.

Thanks for any assistance.

Rich

http://www.nihontomessageboard.com/rt/Masahide-tsuba.jpg
